question_text:
Question 7 
 
A rectangular paper sheet of dimensions 
54cm 4cm

 is taken. The two longer edges of the sheet are
joined together to create a cylindrical tube. A cube whose surface area is equal to the area of the sheet is 
also taken. 
 
Then, the ratio of the volume of the cylindrical tube to the volume of the cube is
[Logical reasoning, 3]
(A) 
1

 
(B) 
2

(C) 
3

 
(D) 
4

